Name: Combine Group
description:
The bag is Josephineâ€™s line of business. She tailors bags making traveling bags and handbags made from different fabrics among them, cloth and leather. She is a 47 year old widowed mother of three. She works hard in order to make sure that her family is well fed and catered for. She travels from place selling her various bags. In some instances she spends some time away from her home to make ends meet selling even in the outskirts of Harare. She is a member of Combine group which has four women staying in Dzivarasekwa Extension, a township in Harare Zimbabwe.

The group is applying for their second loan with Thrive. The women have faced challenges as a group but faced them head on helping each other to achieve their goals. The other group members are Pronella, Chipo and Berlin who run preschool businesses, cross border and chicken projects respectively.
With her loan she is planning to buy more material, including hard and durable canvas material so as to sew more bags and have a wider variety.
